doc:
Lew Ayres https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lew_Ayres 0 Lewis Frederick Ayres III (December 28, 1908 – December 30, 1996) was an American actor whose film and television career spanned 65 years. He is best known for starring as German soldier Paul Bäumer in the film All Quiet on the Western Front (1930) and for playing Dr. Kildare in nine movies. He was nominated for an Academy Award for his performance in Johnny Belinda (1948). Lewis_Frederick_Ayres_III ( December_28_,_1908 – December_30 , 1996 ) was an_American_actor whose_film_and_television_career spanned 65_years . He is_best_known for starring as German_soldier_Paul_Bäumer in the_film All_Quiet on the_Western_Front_(_1930_) and for playing Dr._Kildare in nine_movies . He was_nominated for an_Academy_Award for his_performance in Johnny_Belinda_(_1948_) .
